name: Devices
description: Enterprise assets (data processing and storage), end-user devices, portable/mobile devices, servers, IoT, and network devices.

name: Applications
description: Software programs running on top of an operating system, including web, database, cloud, and mobile apps.

name: Data
description: Digital data stored, transferred, and processed by enterprise assets, including sensitive, log, and physical data.

name: Users
description: Employees, contractors, service providers, and authorized users including administrator and service accounts.

name: Network
description: Interconnected devices that exchange data, including physical/virtual infrastructure and architecture.

name: Software
description: Operating systems and applications, including services, libraries, APIs, and firmware.

name: Documentation
description: Policies, processes, procedures, plans, diagrams, and other written material (physical or digital).
